name: Swaggy Nukes
description:
My entry for the March 2020 LibGDX Ultra Epic Jam!!!

It's a GLOBAL THERMONUCLEAR WAR! annihilate your opponent with powerful NUKES, let him know who's boss!

  1. Collect gold from your base
  2. Build nuclear silos
  3. Expand your territory
  4. Destroy the opponent!!!

Key Features:

  • 2 Player on the same PC
  • Strategize your way to victory
  • Easy controlls
  • Chaos and destruction
